abstract: For weeks, we have been told that the N.F.L. has turned into a passing league, that the pinball-machine passing and scoring numbers were the new norm. Then Week 6 arrived.
snippet: For weeks, we have been told that the N.F.L. has turned into a passing league, that the pinball-machine passing and scoring numbers were the new norm. Then Week 6 arrived.

headline.main: Correction Has Arrived for N.F.L. Passing Barrage
headline.print_headline: Scoring Passes Fall As Early Frenzy Slows
